Class MapOpticsArc

ComparativeGenomics.Drawing.MapOpticsArc

public class MapOpticsArc extends Arc2D.Double
Extends Arc2D. Arc drawn between two chromosome on the circos plots

franpeters

  • Constructor Details

    • MapOpticsArc

      public MapOpticsArc(double x, double y, double size1, double size2, double start, double var, String name)
      Constructor, sets the location, size, angular extents and closure type of this arc to the specified values
      Parameters:
      x - x-coordinate of the upper-left corner of this arc
      y - y-coordinate of the upper-left corner of this arc
      size1 - overall width of the full ellipse of which this arc is a partial section
      size2 - overall height of the full ellipse of which this arc is a partial section
      start - starting angle of this arc in degrees
      var - angular extend of this arc in degrees
      name - closure type for this arc (OPEN, CHORD, PIE)

  • Method Details

    • returnChrName

      public String returnChrName()
      Gets chromosome name of this arc
      Returns:
      chrName chromosome name
